title: Create a Navigation Layout
description:
Build a horizontal navigation bar using Flexbox.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.navbar`:
   - Use flexbox layout
   - Space items with space-between
   - Vertically center items
   - 16px padding
   - #333 background color

2. Style the `.nav-links` (ul):
   - Use flexbox layout
   - 24px gap between items
   - Remove list bullets
   - Remove default margin and padding

3. Style the `.nav-link` (a):
   - White text color
   - No text decoration
   - 8px vertical padding, 16px horizontal

## Expected Result

A responsive navigation bar with logo on the left and links on the right.

testCases.description: Nav links should have no list style
Nav link should have no text decoration

hints: Use display: flex on the navbar container
Use justify-content: space-between and align-items: center
For nav-links: display: flex, gap: 24px, list-style: none, margin: 0, padding: 0
For nav-link: color: white, text-decoration: none, padding: 8px 16px
